levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 3 [MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo] to the ally with the lowest SP
If target has [MarkOfHeresy], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Target loses 10 SP
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (Max 2)
[WhenUse] If target is a <Mechanical Amalgam>, deal +20% damage
levelList.name: Cackle

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [MarkOfHeresy], reuse this coin (Max 1)

levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 3 [MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo] to the ally with the lowest SP
If target has [MarkOfHeresy], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (Max 2)
[WhenUse] If target is a <Mechanical Amalgam>, deal +20% damage
[StartBattle] The main target for this Skill does not lose [Laceration] Count for this turn.
levelList.name: The Gripping

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Assemble] to all allies next turn for every 3 [Nail] on the target (Max 5)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Assemble] to all allies next turnfor every 3 [Nail] on the target (Max 5)

levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 3 [MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo] to the ally with the lowest SP
If target has [MarkOfHeresy], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] Count on the target (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +5% more damage for every [Nail] on target
- If this unit has [Assemble], deal +25% damage
- If target is a <Mechanical Amalgam>, deal +25% damage
[EnemyKill] Heal all allies for 15 SP and apply 3 [Assemble] and 3 [AttackDmgUp] to all allies next turn
levelList.name: Execution

levelList.desc:
If target has [MarkOfHeresy], Coin Power +2
[OnSucceedEvade] Target loses 5 SP
[OnSucceedEvade] Heal 5 SP
levelList.name: Such Filth
